traits.name: End Effect
effects: At the end of her turn, Cornelia can take 5 damage to end one save ends effect affecting her. This damage can’t be reduced in any way.

traits.name: Death Void
effects: When Cornelia is destroyed, each enemy within 2 squares of her takes 5 corruption damage.

abilities.name: Zweihander Swing
effects: An ally within 10 of Cornelia can make a free strike.

effects.effect: The ally can use their signature action instead.

abilities.name: You!
effects: The target is marked until the start of Cornelia’s next turn. Cornelia and each of her allies gain an edge on abilities used against targets marked by her.

abilities.name: Parry!
abilities.trigger: A creature targets the blackguard or an ally adjacent to Cornelia with a strike.

abilities.name: Advance!
effects: Cornelia shifts up to her speed. During or after this movement, she can use Zweihander Swing twice.

abilities.name: I Can Throw My Blade and So Should You!
effects: Cornelia uses Zweihander Swing against each target. Then, each ally within 5 of the area can make a free strike against a target (one target per ally).
